name: consumers_get_reviews
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool unofficial_trust_pilot.
Tool description: This API helps to query data relating to reviews and consumer reports to create a reviewing platform, such as : trustpilot.com
API description: Retrieve reviews for a specific consumer from the Trustpilot API.

is_id.description: The value of consumer->id field returned in .../business-units/get-reviews or .../consumers/detail endpoint

includereportedreviews.description: Specifies whether or not to include reported reviews. Defaults to None.

perpage.description: The number of items to include per page for pagination purposes. Defaults to 1.

page.description: The number of items to include per page for pagination purposes. Defaults to 1.
